local_intent: Confirm visibility, approach and align to the red object with tight tolerance (retry once if needed), then verify visibility remains.
assumptions: Camera view of red_object is available
Clear path to the object on a planar table
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence up to the approach phase: scan, verify visibility, approach/alignment with same target and timeouts, then re-verify. Adds a bounded retry consistent with recovery strategy.
